generated.css: .filters-wrapper{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:1rem 2rem;border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,52.2%,.2);width:100vw;margin:0 auto}.showfilter-wrapper{position:absolute;background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.95);visibility:hidden;right:0;width:30vw;height:90vh;z-index:1000;border:1px solid hsla(0,0%,52.2%,.2);border-top:none;padding:2rem;margin-bottom:2rem}.sideBarFilter ul{list-style:none}.sideBarFilter ul li{padding:1rem 2rem;border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);font-size:1;font-family:Roboto;color:#000;align-self:center;cursor:pointer;transition:.3s ease-in-out;display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.sideBarFilter ul li:hover{background-color:#111;color:#fff;transition:.3s ease-in-out}.fadeFilters{animation:fadeFilters .5s ease-in-out forwards}.fadeOutFilter{animation:fadeOutFilter .5s ease-in-out forwards}.ais-Stats-text{font-family:Roboto;font-weight:700;font-size:1.2rem;color:#000}.ais-ClearRefinements-button{padding:.6rem 2rem;border-radius:0!important;background-color:#fff;font-size:1;font-family:Roboto;font-style:italic;font-weight:300;color:#000!important;opacity:1;align-self:center;transition:.3s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer}.ais-ClearRefinements-button:after{margin-top:.2rem;display:block;content:"";border-bottom:1px solid #000;transform:scaleX(1.1);transition:transform .3s ease-in-out}.ais-ClearRefinements-button:hover:after{transform:scaleX(0)}.ais-ClearRefinements-button:hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:#fff;color:#000!important}.btn-filter{padding:.6rem 2rem;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.5);font-size:1;font-family:Roboto;color:#000;align-self:center;cursor:pointer;transition:.3s ease-in-out}.btn-filter:hover{background-color:#111;color:#fff;transition:.3s ease-in-out}.btn-filter i{margin-left:.5rem}.left-panel{padding:2rem}.category-wrapper,.color-wrapper,.gender-wrapper,.size-wrapper{visibility:hidden;transform:translateX(100%);position:absolute;top:10rem}.btn-backFilter{width:120px;border-radius:0!important;background-color:initial;font-family:Roboto;font-style:italic;font-weight:300;color:#000!important;opacity:1;align-self:center;transition:.3s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer;margin-bottom:2rem}.btn-backFilter:after{margin-top:.3rem;display:block;content:"";border-bottom:1px solid #000;transform:scaleX(1.1);transition:transform .3s ease-in-out}.btn-backFilter:hover:after{transform:scaleX(0)}.btn-backFilter i{margin-right:2rem}.left-panel h2{font-family:Castoro,serif;margin:1rem 0}.ais-RefinementList-list{margin:1rem 0}.ais-RefinementList-labelText{color:#000;font-family:Roboto;font-size:1rem;font-weight:300}.ais-RefinementList-count{width:30px;height:20px;font-size:.6rem;font-style:italic;color:#fff;background-color:rgba(78,78,78,.295);border-radius:5px;align-self:center}.currentRefinment-filters{display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap}.hexColor-list .ais-RefinementList-list{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-gap:1rem}.hexColor-list .ais-RefinementList-list .ais-RefinementList-item div,.hexColor-list .ais-RefinementList-list label{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.hexColor-list .ais-RefinementList-list label{text-align:center;font-size:.8rem;margin:.2rem auto .1rem;color:#000;font-family:Roboto}.colorInput[type=color]{-webkit-appearance:none;border:none;border-radius:50%;width:32px;height:32px;align-self:center}.colorInput[type=color]::-webkit-color-swatch-wrapper{padding:0}.colorInput[type=color]::-webkit-color-swatch{border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.5);border-radius:50%}.current-refinements li{cursor:pointer;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid rgba(8,8,8,.9);list-style:none;border-radius:0;margin:.3rem;font-family:Roboto;font-size:.8rem;background-color:#dbdbdb;font-style:italic;transition:all .3s ease-in-out}.current-refinements li:hover{background-color:#fff;transform:scale(1.02);transition:all .3s ease-in-out}.current-refinements li span{color:#000;font-size:.8rem}.btnCloseRefinements{color:#000;border:none;background:transparent;margin-left:.4rem}@keyframes fadeFilters{0%{transform:translateX(100%);visibility:visible;opacity:.2}to{transform:translateX(0);visibility:visible;opacity:1}}@keyframes fadeOutFilter{0%{transform:translateX(0);visibility:visible;opacity:1}to{transform:translateX(100%);visibility:hidden;opacity:0}}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.left-panel{grid-template-columns:repeat(1,1fr);padding:0}.left-panel h2{margin:1rem 0}.ais-RefinementList-list{margin:1rem 0;font-size:.6rem}}
